description:
Denver Winter

No water shall be abstracted when the Licence Holder is notified by the Agency in writing that the Combined Flow is EQUAL TO or LESS THAN:

From 1 November to 31 December and 1 March to 31 March

113,652 cubic metres per day (Equivalent to 1.3 cubic metres per second and 25 million gallons per day)

From 1 January to the last day of February

318,226 cubic metres per day (Equivalent to 3.68 cubic metres per second and 70 million gallons per day)

Or such other Combined Flow being not greater than the above figures as shall be notified to the Licence Holder by the Agency in writing.

In this Provision “the Combined Flow” shall mean the flows of water in the Ely Ouse River and the Cut-Off Channel as measured by the Agency at the Denver Sluices when added together.
